metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1316 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Juju Core's Joyent provider before version 1.25.5 uploads the user's private ssh key.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1316` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

juju - 1.24.7-0ubuntu1~14.04.1
juju-core - 1.24.7-0ubuntu1~14.04.1
juju-local - 1.24.7-0ubuntu1~14.04.1
juju-local-kvm - 1.24.7-0ubuntu1~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: juju-core package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.24.7-0ubuntu1~14.04.1').
